name: New Harvest Church
description: Non-denominational Christian church serving the London, Kentucky community. Offers regular worship services including Sunday School, Sunday Morning Service, Wednesday Night Service, and Wednesday UpRising Youth program. Provides community food pantry services for eligible Laurel County residents. The church focuses on worship, prayer, and community outreach, serving families and students in the area.
source: Verified from official Facebook page and multiple sources
hours_of_operation: Sunday School: 10:30 AM, Sunday Morning Service: 11:30 AM, Wednesday Night Service: 7:00 PM, Wednesday UpRising Youth: 7:00 PM. Food pantry hours: Irregular - call for details.
eligibility: Food pantry services available to eligible Laurel County residents
services: Worship services, Sunday School, Youth programs, Community food pantry, Pastoral counseling, Prayer ministry
notes: Church has 2K+ likes and 2.5K+ followers on Facebook. Rated 5.0 out of 5 with positive community reviews. Food pantry operates on irregular schedule - contact church for current availability.
